card1.title: Root Canal Treatment
card1.desc: Root canal treatment (endodontics) is a dental procedure used to treat infection at the centre of a tooth.

card2.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
card2.desc: Improving the appearance of your teeth through whitening, crowns, and veneers.

card3.title: Dental Implants
card3.desc: Long-term replacement for missing teeth using titanium implants for stability and comfort.
